segments.text: Hi , Peter . I ’ m afraid I can ’ t make it to dinner tomorrow night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s just I ’ m not feeling well . I think I ’ m coming down with a cold or something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I ’ m sorry to hear that . Hey , don ’ t worry about the dinner . We ’ ll do it some other time . But you take care of yourself .
segments.speaker: S2
